 - Call close manually.

1.1 (2010-11-19)
----------------

 - Allow no port definition in post URL.
   [ﾅ「kasz Nowak]

 - Support case when program exited to early, so no more additional tracebacks
   are emitted.
   [ﾅ「kasz Nowak]

 - Initial version.
